snippet: A majority of the church’s regional bodies have now endorsed a change that broadens the definition of marriage.
abstract: Members of Presbyterian Church (USA) vote to change church's definition of marriage to allow same-sex unions, joining several other large denominations in United States who have moved to permit same-sex marriages.
lead_paragraph: A majority of the church’s regional bodies have now endorsed a change that broadens the definition of marriage.

headline.main: Largest Presbyterian Denomination Gives Final Approval for Same-Sex Marriage
